name: Air Fryer Classic Meatloaf
preparation: In a large bowl, combine seasoning, ground beef, egg, and water. Using your hands or a large spoon, mix until well blended.
Shape into loaf, about 8" long by 3" wide. Place in air fryer basket.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine ketchup, sugar, and mustard.
After 15 min cooking time, spread prepared sauce over meatloaf; cook 5 min, or until internal temperature reaches 160° F.
tips: Before slicing the meatloaf, let rest 5–10 min.
To help shape meatloaf, press mixture into Rectangular Steamer and carefully flip into air fryer basket.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mashed potatoes or rice, and 1 cup steamed vegetables.
